item.title: Drains blocked with oil, 30th June
item.description:
Vendors from the street food market are disposing of used cooking oils down the gully drain on the high street. The area was only pressure washed a fortnight ago!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 92, Balham High Road, Balham, London

item.title: A persistent issue with fly tipping of rubbish outside our flat., 30th June
item.description:
On the entrance to Tom Coombs Close SE9 6SW, there is a constant slew of rubbish by the gym bin. This bin exists in an alcove that gets filled with rubbish by multiple people in the area (there is correspondence in this rubbish that has given us names and addresses nearby). The alcove has threats of fines and even CCTV monitoring the area, however this seems to be a lie as there are no cameras in the vicinity. It is becoming a health hazard along with being unsightly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Odeon Parade, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet
